trans-unit.source: To achieve remote and transparent access to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> services over the Internet, mapping the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server into the Reverse Proxy URL-space is essential.

seg-source.mrk: To achieve remote and transparent access to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> services over the Internet, mapping the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server into the Reverse Proxy URL-space is essential.

target.mrk: Afin de permettre un accès distant aux services <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> depuis Internet, il faut que le proxy inversé puisse connaître les URLs permettant de se connecter au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>.

trans-unit.source: A client request to the Reverse Proxy server has to be internally converted into a proxy request to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server. The Reverse Proxy must also redirect the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server response to the client.

seg-source.mrk: A client request to the Reverse Proxy server has to be internally converted into a proxy request to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.
The Reverse Proxy must also redirect the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server response to the client.

target.mrk: Une requête client à destination du proxy inversé doit être convertie en interne en une requête pour le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Le proxy inversé doit aussi rediriger la réponse du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vers le client.
